M2M ISS API
VPS Driver API » M2M Interface API

Modules

 BSP_DRV_IOCTL_VPS_M2M_ISS
 

Files

file  vps_m2mIss.h
 Interface specific to ISS memory to memory driver.
 

Macros

#define VPS_M2M_ISS_INST_CAL_ISP   (0U)
 ISS M2M Instance for the Path CAL -> ISP.
 
#define VPS_M2M_ISS_INST_SIMCOP   (1U)
 SIMCOP Instance for the Path DDR -> SIMCOP -> DDR.
 
#define VPS_M2M_ISS_INST_CALM2M   (2U)
 CAL B Instance for the Path DDR -> ISS CAL (A) -> DDR. Applicable only for tda2px.
 
#define VPS_M2M_INTF_INST_MAX   (5U)
 Maximum number of M2M ISS driver instance. More...
 
#define VPS_M2M_ISS_IOCTL_BASE   (VPS_M2M_IOCTL_BASE + 0x0300U)
 ISS M2M driver IOCTL base. VPS_M2M_IOCTL_BASE + 0x200U is already used by generic M2M interface.
 
#define VPS_M2M_SIMCOP_IOCTL_BASE   (VPS_M2M_IOCTL_BASE + 0x0400U)
 SIMCOP M2M driver IOCTL base. VPS_M2M_IOCTL_BASE + 0x200U is already used by generic M2M interface.
 
#define VPS_M2M_ISS_CAL_IOCTL_BASE   (VPS_M2M_IOCTL_BASE + 0x0500U)
 SIMCOP M2M driver IOCTL base. VPS_M2M_IOCTL_BASE + 0x200U is already used by generic M2M interface.
 

Detailed Description

This modules define APIs for memory to memory operation using CAL-ISP in ISS.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define VPS_M2M_INTF_INST_MAX   (5U)

Maximum number of M2M ISS driver instance.

Warning
This is a read only macro. Don't modify the value of this macro.Maximum number of M2M ISS driver instance.
